title: Letter to his father
creator: Renzo Renzi
scope_and_content: Personal letter written by Renzo Renzi to his father during World War II, describing his intellectual life at the front.
current_location: Renzo Renzi Library, Cineteca di Bologna
conditions_governing_access: Access permitted for study and research.
conditions_governing_reproduction: Reproduction only with permission of the Renzi Estate.
